MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY10 postcode area of Oswestry, affecting properties in Selattyn and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:13 am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9:15 am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:40 am on 19th February, 2021.
